quote_first: Somewhere he’d lost three days; for he’d entered the burning veil Thursday,
quote_last: . Yes. But keep cool. There’s more at stake than three lost days. There must be; otherwise why the police?
title: Redemolished
author: Alfred Bester

quote_first: Justin turned on the light and groggily looked at the Sony clock radio which said it was
quote_last: The screams in his dream had been painfully, frighteningly real, but he could not remember where the screams had come from.
title: Crow's Nest
author: G.V. Miller
